summary.span: 使用 物件的 或 存取子，提供該物件的屬性值存取。

span.span: Provides access to the property values of a object using its or accessors.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property CanMove As Boolean
public: property bool CanMove { bool get(); };

summary.span: 取得值，指定 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] 項目是否可以移動。

span.span: Gets a value that specifies whether the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] element can be moved.

value.span: 如果項目可以移動，則為 ；否則為 。

span.span: if the element can be moved; otherwise .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 無法移動、 調整大小或旋轉，使得產生的螢幕位置會完全超出座標，其容器，而無法以鍵盤或滑鼠存取物件。An object cannot be moved, resized or rotated such that its resulting screen location would be completely outside the coordinates of its container and inaccessible to keyboard or mouse. 例如，最上層的視窗時移離螢幕完全或子物件移容器的檢視區界限之外。For example, when a top-level window is moved completely off-screen or a child object is moved outside the boundaries of the container's viewport. 在這些情況下，物件會放置最接近所要求的螢幕座標越好，覆寫為容器範圍內的頂端或左邊的座標。In these cases the object is placed as close to the requested screen coordinates as possible with the top or left coordinates overridden to be within the container boundaries. ## Examples 在下列範例中，控制項模式取自隨後使用它來移動。In the following example, a control pattern is obtained from an and subsequently used to move the . [!code-csharp[UIATransformPattern_snip#101](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIATransformPattern_snip/CSharp/UIATransformPattern_snippets.cs#101)] [!code-vb[UIATransformPattern_snip#101](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIATransformPattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIATransformPattern_snippets.vb#101)] [!code-csharp[UIATransformPattern_snip#103](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIATransformPattern_snip/CSharp/UIATransformPattern_snippets.cs#103)] [!code-vb[UIATransformPattern_snip#103](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIATransformPattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIATransformPattern_snippets.vb#103)]

value.span: 如果項目可調整大小，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the element can be resized; otherwise .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 無法移動、 調整大小或旋轉，使得產生的螢幕位置會完全超出座標，其容器，而無法以鍵盤或滑鼠存取物件。An object cannot be moved, resized, or rotated such that its resulting screen location would be completely outside the coordinates of its container and inaccessible to keyboard or mouse. 例如，最上層的視窗時移離螢幕完全或子物件移容器的檢視區界限之外。For example, when a top-level window is moved completely off-screen or a child object is moved outside the boundaries of the container's viewport. 在這些情況下，物件會放置最接近所要求的螢幕座標越好，覆寫為容器範圍內的頂端或左邊的座標。In these cases the object is placed as close to the requested screen coordinates as possible with the top or left coordinates overridden to be within the container boundaries. ## Examples 在下列範例中，控制項模式取自隨後使用它來調整大小。In the following example, a control pattern is obtained from an and subsequently used to resize the . [!code-csharp[UIATransformPattern_snip#101](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIATransformPattern_snip/CSharp/UIATransformPattern_snippets.cs#101)] [!code-vb[UIATransformPattern_snip#101](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIATransformPattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIATransformPattern_snippets.vb#101)] [!code-csharp[UIATransformPattern_snip#104](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIATransformPattern_snip/CSharp/UIATransformPattern_snippets.cs#104)] [!code-vb[UIATransformPattern_snip#104](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIATransformPattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIATransformPattern_snippets.vb#104)]
